Log in
November 2024 Edition
Zapier's latest
Explore the latest product updates and app news for more seamless workflows.
What's new
Multi-channel conversations: Let your Chatbot answer questions in any app
Chatbots can now respond to questions across multiple channels-email, text, customer support apps, and more-so you can reach your customers wherever they are.
See it in action
Pinned apps & events: A faster way to build your workflows
No more hunting for your go-to apps! Now you can pin your favorites right in the Zap Editor for lightning-fast workflow building.
Give it a try
Make Zapier your business command center
Bring every workflow, process, and automation together into your own custom dashboard. We'll show you how with Zaps, Interfaces, and Tables.
Learn how
Spotlight
Filter your workflows
Want more control over your automated workflows? Learn how Zapier's Filter tool helps you set rules so your Zaps only run when they really need to.
How filters work →
Connect apps with webhooks
Curious about webhooks? Learn how these digital messengers let your apps talk to each other, so you can build your perfect system.
Read the guide →
New and noteworthy apps
Highlighting 10 new integrations and 16 updates, including…
Salesforce
With the New Case Attachment trigger, you can initiate follow-ups, improve response times, and improve your customer's support experience.
Explore Zoom Salesforce integrations →
QuickBooks Online
Keep your sales and accounting accurate with the Update Bill and Update Estimate actions.
Explore QuickBooks Online integrations →
Calendly
Skip the back-and-forth scheduling for those last-minute meetings with the new Create One-Off Event action.
Explore Calendly integrations →
Foxy.io
Foxy.io is a secure checkout system that lets you sell products, subscriptions, and digital goods through your existing website.
Explore Foxy.io integrations →
Keaz
Keaz is a customer engagement platform that improves retention through messaging channels.
Explore Keaz integrations →
